command_line.description: Configuration file name relative to data-dir
command_line.name: config

command_line.description: Directory containing configuration file config.ini. Default location: $HOME/.beekeeper or CWD/. beekeeper
command_line.name: data-dir

command_line.description: Dump information about all supported command line and config options in JSON format and exit
command_line.name: dump-options

command_line.description: Export explicitly private keys to a local file `wallet_name.keys`. Both [name, password] are required for every wallet. By default is empty.Two wallets example: --export-keys-wallet "["blue-wallet", "PW5JViFn5gd4rt6ohk7DQMgHzQN6Z9FuMRfKoE5Ysk25mkjy5AY1b"]" --export-keys-wallet "["green-wallet", "PW5KYF9Rt4ETnuP4uheHSCm9kLbCuunf6RqeKgQ8QRoxZmGeZUhhk"]"
command_line.name: export-keys-wallet

command_line.description: Print this help message and exit.
command_line.name: help

command_line.description: Print names of all available plugins and exit
command_line.name: list-plugins

common.description: Whether to print backtrace on SIGSEGV
common.name: backtrace

common.description: Plugin(s) to enable, may be specified multiple times
common.name: plugin

common.description: Protection against unlocking by bots. Every wrong `unlock` enables a delay. By default 500[ms].
common.name: unlock-interval

common.description: Timeout for unlocked wallet in seconds (default 900 (15 minutes)).Wallets will be automatically locked after specified number of seconds of inactivity.Activity is defined as any wallet command e.g. list-wallets.
common.name: unlock-timeout

common.description: The path of the wallet files (absolute path or relative to application data dir)
common.name: wallet-dir

common.description: Local http endpoint for webserver requests.
common.name: webserver-http-endpoint

common.description: File name with a server's certificate.
common.name: webserver-https-certificate-file-name

common.description: Local https endpoint for webserver requests.
common.name: webserver-https-endpoint

common.description: File name with a server's private key.
common.name: webserver-https-key-file-name

common.description: Number of threads used to handle queries. Default: 32.
common.name: webserver-thread-pool-size

common.description: Local unix http endpoint for webserver requests.
common.name: webserver-unix-endpoint

common.description: Enable the RFC-7692 permessage-deflate extension for the WebSocket server (only used if the client requests it).  This may save bandwidth at the expense of CPU
common.name: webserver-ws-deflate

common.description: Local websocket endpoint for webserver requests.
common.name: webserver-ws-endpoint
